stories.text:
I think a lot of us in the Bay have dreams of working in tech outside of the country. Living in Paris, or Bangkok or anywhere that isn’t the bay.

What is it actually like to work in tech outside of the country?

What is it like in your country? How do you feel about the experience?
stories.title: Ask HN: What is it like working in tech internationally?
How the Far Right Use Memes to Recruit

stories.text:
Supporting accessibility for E-Commerce websites has never been easier. Tenably is the first Automated solution, offering a fast way to convert your Shopify store and remove barriers by automatically updating the store's theme. No human intervention needed!

We’re running a limited Beta of 100 stores.

What's an Auto Remediation tool? Tenably's solution identifies common barriers (Web Accessibility violations) for shop owners. Such as low contrast, specific markup errors, and missing alt tags. We then resolve them for you by updating the theme. No need to hire outside resources or perform manual tasks.

Tenably helps you keep your Shopify store accessible, and maintain that accessibility over time with automated repair reports and fixes. If you’re on Shopify, this tool means you can spend less time making your store accessible, and more time improving your business.

https://www.tenably.app/#/shopify
stories.title: We use GPT-3 to fix Shopify theme Web Accessibility
